DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to demonstrate, that there is no difference in metabolic control in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and therapy with human insulin with or without injection-meal-interval.
DOC.brief_title: The Necessity of an Injection-Meal-Interval in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and Therapy With Human Insulin
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Aged 40 80 years Therapy with human insulin Pregnancy Nutrition disorders Psychological disease Body Mass Index (BMI) less than 25 kg/m^2 HbA1c greater than 9%
